named-query.name: Restaurant.searchByName
named-query.query: from Restaurant where name like concat('%', :name, '%') and kitchen.id = :d

named-query.name: Restaurant.isRestaurantResponsible
named-query.query: select case when count(rest) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurant rest join rest.responsible resp where rest.id = :restaurantId and resp.id = :userId
